div.span: Lapeer Community Schools will be closed today, Friday, January 12, due to impending hazardous road conditions. Kids & Company will be open for childcare only.

div.style: height: 1800px; width: 600px;
border-width: 0px; position: absolute; overflow: hidden; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; left: 173px; top: 0px; width: 1px; height: 1px;

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; caret-color: rgb(28, 30, 33); color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-size: 14px;

div.p: The road closure situation in downtown Lapeer remains as it was this morning. There are still many bus stops that our buses cannot access. Parents who dropped their students off this morning should make plans to pick them up this afternoon. The three meeting points from this morning are still being used this afternoon: Gerlach's Bowling Center parking lot, the church at the corner of Nepessing and Bowers Road (The Point) and the church at Oregon and Saginaw Road (New Hope).

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; caret-color: rgb(28, 30, 33); color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-size: 14px;

div.p: For LHS/Zemmer/RW students: We will get them as close to their bus stop as possible. For Schickler and Turrill Elementary parents: You should plan to meet the bus at the same location as this morning.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px 0px; display: inline; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; caret-color: rgb(28, 30, 33); color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-size: 14px;

div.p: Finally, if the situation downtown is not resolved today, we will repeat this same process in the morning.

div.style: border-width: 0px; position: absolute; overflow: hidden; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; left: 173px; top: 0px; width: 1px; height: 1px;

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; caret-color: rgb(28, 30, 33); color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-size: 14px;

Parents who dropped their students off this morning should make plans to pick them up this afternoon. The three meeting points from this morning are still being used this afternoon: Gerlach's Bowling Center parking lot, the church at the corner of Nepessing and Bowers Road (The Point) and the church at Oregon and Saginaw Road (New Hope).

div.p: Finally, if the situation downtown is not resolved today, we will repeat this same process in the morning.
